---
layout: "../../layouts/BlogPost.astro"
title: "Embed images in markdown"
datetime: "2023-05-13"
tags: [markdown]
---

Today I learned ([from SO](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/50817518/hard-code-markdown-images)) that you embed base64 encoded images in markdown, by putting the string in the url field.

```markdown
![red](data:image/webp;base64,)
```

**Output:**
![red](data:image/webp;base64,)

# ðŸ”´
